title: Is Right-Wing Media Ready to Dump Trump? Angelo Carusone Interview

media:group.media:title: Is Right-Wing Media Ready to Dump Trump? Angelo Carusone Interview
media:group.media:description:
-- Angelo Carusone, President and CEO of Media Matters, joins David to discuss the right wing echo chamber, Trump's absence from Fox News, the future of networks like Newsmax and OAN, and much more
